country.spain.metaDesc: Browse leading doctors in Spain. Filter by clinic, department and city.
country.spain.title: Spain — Doctors Directory
country.spain.subtitle: Information-only catalog. Quirónsalud network (Madrid, Barcelona, Valencia, Málaga, Alicante) and Sant Joan de Déu Barcelona.
country.spain.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, specialty, or clinic
country.spain.sort.name: Name
country.spain.empty: No matches. Try changing filters or query.
country.spain.emptyHint: Try another city, clinic or specialty.
country.spain.usp.expertsDesc: We shortlist department heads and leaders of specialized units.
country.spain.usp.safeDesc: Clear coordination, documents in your language, no marketing contracts.
country.spain.usp.careDesc: Personal guidance from the first message to your return home.
country.spain.pitch.title: Not sure which doctor is right for you?
country.spain.pitch.subtitle: Tell me about the diagnosis and preferences. I’ll match you with the right department head, prepare the request, and help you get a quick reply from the clinic.
